## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> for any debug instructions unlinked from their blocks during regalloc.

Stores the instr and it&#39;s location, so that they can be re-inserted after regalloc is over.

Definition at line 568 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livedebugvariables-cpp">LiveDebugVariables.cpp</a>.
